title: ‘Madame Web’ Has Potentially Killed Sony’s Spider-Man Universe
description:
Sony’s Spider-Man Universe began with the release of Venom in 2018. Fans have since been trying to piece together this universe that of Spider-Man characters that exist without Spider-Man. With the release of Madame Web, however, it seems to have potentially killed Sony’s Spider-Man Universe. The franchise currently consists of Venom, Venom: Let There Be [...]

The post ‘Madame Web’ Has Potentially Killed Sony’s Spider-Man Universe appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: ‘Lilo & Stitch’ Set Photos Reveal First Look At Live-Action Remake
description:
Disney has been going through their vast library of animated titles to create modern live-action remakes. Excitingly enough, however, they’ll be going into some different territory with a new iteration of Lilo & Stitch. Now, as you can see below, our first look at the titular characters has been revealed with some new Lilo & [...]
